**Tender Announcement for Tobacco and Vaping Product Laboratory Testing and Research**
=====================================================

**Tender Title:** Tobacco and Vaping Product Laboratory Testing and Research
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029954
**Solicitation Number:** 1000247805

**Publication Date:** March 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** April 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Contracting Entity:** Health Canada
**End User Entity:** Health Canada
**Contact Information:**

* Name: Wesley Phillips
* Email: [wesley.phillips@canada.ca](mailto:wesley.phillips@canada.ca)
* Phone: 613-941-2067
* Address: 200 Eglantine, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada

**Notice Summary:**

The Government of Canada invites bids under this Request for Proposal (RFP) for Tobacco and Vaping Product Laboratory Testing and Research services. The objective of the Work is to provide analytical laboratory services for tobacco and vaping products to the Tobacco Control Directorate of Health Canada.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will provide laboratory testing and research services to support the development of regulatory and policy frameworks for tobacco and vaping products. The services will include:

* Laboratory testing of tobacco and vaping products to support regulatory and policy development
* Research and development of methods for testing and analysis
* Enhancement of the Tobacco Control Directorate's knowledge of tobacco products and measures of exposure or toxicity

**Bidder Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the CanadaBuys website
* The bid must conform to all requirements outlined in the RFP document
* Bidders must demonstrate their expertise and experience in laboratory testing and research services

**Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA):**

Bidders must agree to execute a non-disclosure agreement prior to access to the RFP document.

**Attachments:**

* Bidder Q&A 1
* RFP Final Round 2 (English)
* RFP Final Round 2 (French)

**Notice URL:**

The notice and documents can be accessed at: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/public/notice/1000247805>
